channel.title: [PI]How do i edit Claw spec? [PI]
channel.description: Hey, was wondering how to edit claw specs? i know its abit nooby to ask that but in the combat.assistant, i get a weird code for claw spec lol... Editing other specs is just really simple but the claws one im abit confused.

item.title: [PI]How do i edit Claw spec? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @divinityms divinityms
item.description:
@divinityms wrote:

[quote=“lost it, post:1, topic:402414”]Hey, was wondering how to edit claw specs? i know its abit nooby to ask that but in the combat.assistant, i get a weird code for claw spec lol…
Editing other specs is just really simple but the claws one im abit confused.[/quote]

I don’t know if I am allowed to do this but…

ItemAssistant.java

case 1215:// dragon dagger case 1231: case 5680: case 5698: case 1305: // dragon long case 11694: case 11698: case 11700: case 11730: case 11696: case 13899: case 14484: // Dclaws id c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7574); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7586); break;

CombatAssistant.java
case 14484: // Dragon claws c.startAnimation(6000); c.doubleHit = true; c.usingClaws = true; c.specAccuracy = 6.50; c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;

Read full topic
